name: AV
description:
Play as a primal, who got the fire and wants to spread it.
Complete the levels using AV-connector. Switch color, sound or image to get through the obstacles.

This game was made for Major jam 3 with the theme: Retro and with the limitation of 96 x 96 pixel Resolution.

A, S - for walking
W / Spacebar - for jump 
J - Yellow cable (color)
K - White cable (sound)
L - Red cable (image)
R - to restart level
ESC - back to title screen
You can go to fullscreen - ALT + Enter

Follow us on twitter!
